The hot water is abundant and the stocked kitchen make it easy to make up for the limited restaurants for dinner. The bedding, however, may prevent us from returning. There is one full size mattress that is too soft, and one futon that is too firm (I felt the slats in the frame).
We bring our own water out of habit. We brought our own lighting source for a fire, which we learned the next day there was a warning against fires the night before... so check the Internet before having a bonfire.
While the home does not have Wi-Fi, a plus for us urbanites who wanted to unplug, we had ample Verizon reception.
